Formatting Dates with Quarters

/* data stolen from http://howmanyleft.co.uk/vehicle/jaguar_e_type */
var quarter_data = [
  {"period": "Medicine", "licensed": 3407, "sorned": 660},
  {"period": "Education", "licensed": 3351, "sorned": 629},
  {"period": "Stationery1", "licensed": 3269, "sorned": 618},
  {"period": "Electricity", "licensed": 3246, "sorned": 661},
  {"period": "Telephone", "licensed": 3257, "sorned": 667},
];
Morris.Line({
  element: 'graph',
  data: quarter_data,
  xkey: 'period',
  ykeys: ['licensed', 'sorned'],
  labels: ['Licensed', 'SORN']
});
